tags: Treatment satisfaction,
review: Dr. Suneetha is one of the finest dentists in the city. She has been our family dentist since many years. She is known for the right diagnosis, hassle-free treatment, friendliness and modesty. I highly recommend Dr. Suneetha for any sort of dental issues!

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I would highly recommend cosme dental for anyone who has dental problems, the doctors here are very skilled.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Dr Suneeta madam is very good asset to the hospital. The way she treats and explains the issue is awesome. She used to educate the patients and attendants regarding the issues and later her suggestions are excellent. Mr SreeRam Kumar too extends his friendliness and ease of interacting and suggestions on issues are highly thankful. The clinic is good for Nizampet and surrounding people. Thanks to one and all of the staff of the clinic.- Sreeram, h/o Vijayalakshmi

tags: Doctor friendliness,
review: Very polite, friendly approach, explains the problem and gives the solution. Excellent treatment . Good atmosphere of clinic. Very good attendance. Prompt in maintaining the time and date of appointment. Very good follow up and enquiries about the patient after the treatment. We can get the apartments at our convenience and they oblige. All the doctors are technically excellent. Their approach in attempting the problem is commendable. The location of the Hospital is very convenient to all.

tags: Treatment satisfaction,Explanation of the health issue,Doctor friendliness,Value for money,
review:
I had a confidence only on Dr seetharam kumar for all sorts of treatment 
When he refer me to Dr suneetha Devi I was scared to get the root canal done by her and I waited more than a year by fear of pain
But I was wrong my root canal done by her this week and I am very much happy with her way treatment I am fully satisfied
Thank to Dr suneetha Devi

So next appointment is given to plan further treatment , coz of infection , we could not  do any treatment today , we regret deeply for that

review: To much waiting time and fee also very high and nursing’s vatar behaviour very rude please change front office receptionist she talk very rude
reply_text: Dear sir because of Covid 19 we have to take extreme precautions and because of that waiting time is increased considerably. This is a new pandemic period and we are very prone to get get the disease. Still we are treating patients taking all the risk and to hear such words from you was really disheartening. The amount of risk we take is immense. Please try to understand.
